title: No Game No Life: Practical War Game - Novel Updates
genre: Action   Adventure   Comedy   Ecchi   Fantasy   Mature   Psychological   Romance   Sci-fi   Seinen   Supernatural
tags: Androgynous Characters   Angels   Card Games   Determined Protagonist   Dragons   Dwarfs   Elemental Magic   Elves   Fantasy World   Female Protagonist   Gamers   Generals   Genius Protagonist   Gods   Loli   Male Protagonist   Sadistic Characters   Saving the World   Secret Organizations   Survival   Trap   Unique Weapons   Wars
author: Kamiya Yuu
description:
Before the creation of Disboard—a world where everything is decided by games—there raged an eternal war that tore apart the stars. The notorious Immanity weren’t the only ones who sought to bring an end to the Great War, by their owns means of play. However, some played by different rules—such as the future a certain Elf envisioned: “If you kill all the stars and remain standing, you win.” In other words—“anything goes!” In addition to the newly-written story of “another end of the war” following Think Nirvalen, this special volume also holds the many erratic short stories included in the anime’s bonus features!

“Now—let the war begin~”>
